# NeuralSens Application

We are pleased to announce the availability of an application to run the NeuralSens library. This application provides an easy-to-use interface for leveraging the powerful features of the NeuralSens package.

The development of this application was made possible thanks to the support of the Cátedra Santalucía Analytics for Education.
